medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent left lower quadrant abdominal pain that has worsened over the last few days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced several months of intermittent left lower quadrant abdominal pain that historically lasted a few hours and improved after defecation. Recently, the pain has worsened, has not improved with bowel movements, and is now more severe. Last week, one episode of vomiting briefly alleviated the pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, History of cholecystectomy, Diverticulosis, Benign neoplasm of colon.
medical_history.family_history: Mother: Diabetes Mellitus. Sister: Not specified.
